document.full_text: mothers of people killed during pro-democracy protests near beijing's tiananmen square more than two decades ago said on tuesday authorities had raised the issue of compensation but offered no apologies or public account of the crackdown.
document.title: tiananmen mothers say government hints at payment, no apology
